definition: marginal notes/annotation/to annotate/to add comments to text
to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]
to explain/to release/Buddha (abbr. for 釋迦牟尼|释迦牟尼[Shi4 jia1 mou2 ni2])/Buddhism

sentences.english: If not, it provides error reporting through annotations.
sentences.chinese: 如果不适合，编辑器通过注释来提供错误报告。

sentences.english: It indicates that the annotated method is overriding a method in a superclass.
sentences.chinese: 它指明注释的方法将覆盖超类中的方法。

sentences.english: All of the code written so far is just back-end code plus some annotations.
sentences.chinese: 至此我们所写的所有代码都是一些后端代码和注释。

sentences.english: The comment page must have no less than PR2.
sentences.chinese: 注释页必须不低于PR2的少。

sentences.english: The single word gloss was usually interlined.
sentences.chinese: 对单个词的注释还常用间注法。

sentences.english: It includes no data, just the annotation name.
sentences.chinese: 它不包含数据，仅有注释名称。

sentences.english: However, this limitation can be overcome by manually inserting the annotations.
sentences.chinese: 但是，通过手动添加注释能够克服这种局限性。

sentences.english: Videos come with cheesy, but sometimes informative commentary.
sentences.chinese: 配以质量不高但偶尔信息量丰富的注释。

sentences.english: Here’s my cell, and my e-mail, and ...” Contact information is now contact exegesis.
sentences.chinese: 联系信息成了现在的联系注释。

sentences.english: Complete annotations of data source models.
sentences.chinese: 完成数据源模型的注释。

sentences.english: Comments appear in red. I can see those.
sentences.chinese: 注释是红色的，我可以看到这些注释。

sentences.english: Comments appear in red. I can see those.
sentences.chinese: 注释是红色的，我可以看到这些注释。

sentences.english: This annotation will be discussed in detail in the next section.
sentences.chinese: 这个注释将在下一节进行详细介绍。

sentences.english: The results of the retention test in English single glosses condition are the highest.
sentences.chinese: 英语单项注释条件下习得的词汇延时成绩最高。

sentences.english: You can use "dot notation" to query embedded objects.
sentences.chinese: 您可以使用“点注释”来查询嵌入的对象。

sentences.english: I feel like I'm going cross-eyed as I oscillate between the code and the comment.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得在代码和注释之间看来看去搞得我很晕。

definition: the meaning of sth/an explanation of the meaning of words or phrases/definition/an interpretation (of doctrine)/religious doctrine
to quote/to cite/to recommend/to appoint/(computing) reference
clauses and sub-clauses (in formal document)/entry (in a dictionary, encyclopedia etc)
to annotate/to add marginal comments on/criticism/marginalia
